config.name: get_all_user
config.comment: 查询所有注册用户信息
config.email_body: 查询所有注册用户信息共{}条，见附件
config.sql: select id, username, buy_name, buy_mobile from t_dg_buy_user

config.name: get_daily_new_user
config.comment: 查询每天新注册用户信息
config.email_body: 查询到昨天注册用户信息共{}条，见附件
config.sql: SELECT t.id, t.username, t.buy_name, t.buy_mobile FROM t_dg_buy_user t, t_dg_invitation_code c WHERE im_token IS NOT NULL AND t.create_date >= DATE_FORMAT('2020-01-23 00:00:00', '%Y-%m-%d %H:%k:%s') AND t.create_date <= DATE_FORMAT('2020-01-23 23:59:00', '%Y-%m-%d %H:%k:%s') AND t.buy_mobile = c.mobile ORDER BY t.create_date DESC
